createArchiveWithSign
The function for creating an archive with pre-attached files.
Syntax
createArchiveWithSign
(fileName, fileClassification, fileList, includeSigns, password)
Setting
Purpose
fileName
Archive name.
fileClassification
Definition of archive classification.
fileList
Array of files to be packed into an archive.
An array of objects of the
"File"
type [FS_FILE] or an array of IDs of such objects can be specified as an argument.
includeSigns
Feature of adding a file signature.
The parameter can take the following values:
true – a signature file in *.sig format is added for each file;
false – signature files are not added.
password
Password for the created archive. If no password is required, specify
null
.
Note
The function is called from the "Messages" tab of the algorithm editor’s toolbar.
When creating an array using the
createArchiveWithSign
function, renaming the files included in the array is available.
Example
To create an archive, the following algorithm is written:
In the algorithm, the
fileList
document array is defined. The
createArchiveWithSign
function creates an archive containing documents without signatures. No password is set for the archive.
